Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add comprehensive integration configuration guide and AI SDLC framework

Added extensive documentation and tooling for integration with Jira, Azure DevOps, source controls, and CI/CD pipelines. Includes AI-powered SDLC framework with agents, evaluations, and workflow orchestration.

Key additions:
- Integration configuration guide for ADO, Jira, GitHub, GitLab
- Validation scripts for all integrations
- AI SDLC agents \(code review, generation, performance analysis, etc.\)
- Evidence collection and management framework
- Plugin adapters for multiple platforms \(ADO, Jira, GitHub, GitLab\)
- Comprehensive test suite with unit and integration tests
- Workflow orchestration and state management
- Epic/PBI generation and requirement synchronization

Documentation includes:
- Step-by-step setup instructions
- Authentication and credential management
- CI/CD pipeline configurations
- Troubleshooting guides
- Best practices and security guidelines

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
